hero.subtitle: Web Developer
hero.text: Front-end developer with extensive experience in creating attractive and functional user interfaces using PUG, SCSS, JavaScript, and GULP. My proficiency in React enables me to develop dynamic and efficient applications, ensuring seamless integration between functionality and design.

description.title: About me
description.text1: Front-end web developer specializing in 'Computer Science for Web Programming'. My self-taught skills have enabled me to work on various projects, focusing on programming best practices, SEO, and scalable structures.
description.text2: I stand out for my contribution to the 'Garcinstal Multiservices' project, where I designed an interactive prototype in Adobe XD, leading to the development of a responsive website with advanced transitions and visual effects.

experience.title: Experience
experience.text1: Participation in the development of a dynamic web platform for Kreisel Events, designed to optimize event management. From the initial conceptualization in Adobe XD to the final programming with GULP, PUG, SCSS, and JavaScript, each stage focused on creating an efficient and adaptable tool to facilitate event planning and execution.
experience.text2: Design and development of the website for Giriga Comida Fusi√≥n, focused on highlighting its fusion cuisine concept. The process began with a preliminary design in Adobe XD, followed by implementation using GULP, PUG, SCSS, and JavaScript. The result was a digital platform that combined functionality with an exceptional user experience, reflecting the passion and quality of their gastronomic offerings.
experience.text3: Complete development of the website for Garcinstal Multiservices LTD, a multi-service company for residential properties. The creation began with an initial design in Adobe XD for interactive prototypes that guided the client and the development process. The web platform was implemented using tools like GULP, PUG, SCSS, and JavaScript, including the creation of a distinctive logo that strengthened the brand identity.
